Keywords: Howling Commandos , Past , S.H.I.E.L.D. , Soldier
Real Name: Steve Rogers
Special Powers
NOT JUST A MODEL SOLDIER, A MODEL PERSON: Leadership. When Skinny Steve Rogers uses it, friendly characters within range are considered adjacent.

Comments
May 31, 2022
Bobcat2022
Yep yep, great little support piece. "Past" gets you all the figures from "Marvel Studios Loki," and Soldier gets you nearly all the pieces from "Marvel Studios The Falcon And The Winter Soldier," so right there that’s half the set you can lead with SSR (did they do that on purpose?). Lots of very focused support pieces in this set, especially in the commons; he does what he does well and at a bargain point cost.
May 2, 2022
Goop
Really good cheap leadership. In a world of no pushing damage leadership is more important than ever. He doesn't even need LOS either, you can hide him behind walls or combine with Captain Carters defend to protect him. Love the synergy there.
April 26, 2022
Brundun94
*sighs* "...I'm tired boss. Mostly tired of Wizkids printing increasingly cheap & efficient dials like printing money, just to feed the competitive players, thinking it will never eventually hit a critical mass." Strong leadership, with damage and range modification... perhaps best support piece in the game. Effectively 3 support abilities with at least three pretty buildable keywords for 15 points seems pretty good.
April 24, 2022
Exothermic
Cheapest leadership ever made, and it's even leadership with upside!
